TopicTitle: Sorry Dave, I'm afraid I can't do that...

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

Stanley Kubrick was depicting correct physic spaceflight in "2001 A Space Odyssey". I was a kid when the film went out (1968) and I was amazed by the movie (and also A.C Clarke book).

With KSP the magic of correct physic spaceflight is back, without the hassle of a harsh simulation. KSP is fun, entertaining and educative. On top of that modders seem to be full of cafein, ready to launch a new space program each day... difficult to ask for more, but ehr... is there a place to ask for more, like suggestions for contents?

Anyway, happy to be onboard.

You can post suggestions in the "Development" section of the forum, here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forumdisplay.php/34-KSP-Development That's for official, stock parts. To request/suggest mods, there's another section: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forumdisplay.php/13-Addon-Requests-and-Support
